WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Acid Arrow
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: A shimmering green arrow streaks toward a target within range and bursts in a spray of acid.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Alter Self
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: You assume a different form.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Arcane Lock
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: You touch a closed door, window, gate, chest, or other entryway, and it becomes locked for the duration.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Arcanist's Magic Aura
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: You place an illusion on a creature or an object you touch so that divination spells reveal false information about it.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Blindness/Deafness
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: You can blind or deafen a foe.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Blur
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Continual Flame
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: A flame, equivalent in brightness to a torch, springs forth from an object that you touch.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Darkness
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Darkvision
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Detect Thoughts
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: For the duration, you can read the thoughts of certain creatures.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Enlarge/Reduce
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: You cause a creature or an object you can see within range to grow larger or smaller for the duration.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Flaming Sphere
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: A 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within range and lasts for the duration.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Gentle Repose
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: You touch a corpse or other remains.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Gust of Wind
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: A line of strong wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you in a direction you choose for the spell's duration.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Hold Person
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Invisibility
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Knock
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: Choose an object that you can see within range.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Levitate
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: One creature or object of your choice that you can see within range rises vertically, up to 20 feet, and remains suspended there for the duration.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Locate Object
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: Describe or name an object that is familiar to you.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Magic Mouth
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: You implant a message within an object in range, a message that is uttered when a trigger condition is met.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Magic Weapon
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: You touch a nonmagical weapon.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Mirror Image
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Misty Step
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Ray of Enfeeblement
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: A black beam of enervating energy springs from your finger toward a creature within range.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Rope Trick
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: You touch a length of rope that is up to 60 feet long.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Scorching Ray
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: See Invisibility
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: For the duration, you see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Shatter
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from a point of your choice within range.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Spider Climb
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Suggestion
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence a creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you.

WizardLevel2Spells.Name: Web
WizardLevel2Spells.Description: You conjure a mass of thick, sticky webbing at a point of your choice within range.
